abstract: Thomas Enevoldsen (born 27 July 1987 in Aalborg) is a Danish professional football midfielder, who currently plays for the Belgian Jupilerliga side KV Mechelen where he has a contract running until June 2015. He has played eight games and scored one goal for the Denmark national football team.
